name: EarthLink
description:
A 2D, point-and-click puzzle solving game. Created for Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 hours.

You are the Windows 98 universe's IT helpdesk support. Yggdrasil needs you...

Features:

  • 3 puzzles of increasing complexity
  • Unique BGM variation for each puzzle
  • Animations and particle VFX
  • Puzzle mechanics coded in Unity C#
  • Fully playable in-browser

Credits:

  • OtterBrother - C#, Unity implementation, narrative, visuals, particle effects
  • ArcanaXIX  - C#, BGM, root SFX
  • S1xPlus - Puzzle design, additional narrative

Supplemental SFX and visuals used from open source libraries. See attached .txt file.
